subject: refactor(layout): move Contact section after Projects for better CTA placement
body:
Place the Contact section (email, LinkedIn, GitHub, interest form) directly
after Projects instead of at the very bottom. Visitors see the call-to-action
at peak engagement — right after reading the story (About) and seeing proof
of work (Projects) — rather than after scrolling through Skills, Experience,
and Education.

Tags: layout, ux, section-order
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-polish
Semver: patch
